Hogeon

Heureun / Flowing

Introduction

Electricity Flowing was a South Korean synth pop duo under ORM Entertainment consisting of Heureun and Hogeon. They debuted on October 1, 2013. On August 4, 2015, they announced on social media that they disbanded.
